channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Agile PLM Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Agile PLM Framework

item.title: CVE-2017-10308|2024-10-04T16:53:46.251Z -- oracle%20corporation -- agile%20plm%20framework
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Agile PLM component of Oracle Supply Chain Products Suite (subcomponent: Performance). Supported versions that are affected are 9.3.5 and 9.3.6. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows physical access to compromise Oracle Agile PLM. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle Agile PLM accessible data as well as unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Agile PLM accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.5 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:P/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2017-10299|2024-10-04T16:54:22.196Z -- oracle%20corporation -- agile%20plm%20framework
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Agile PLM component of Oracle Supply Chain Products Suite (subcomponent: Security). Supported versions that are affected are 9.3.5 and 9.3.6. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Agile PLM. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Agile PLM accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
